about.title:
Hello, I'm

Gabriel, a web developer
about.description: I am a web developer from São Paulo, with experience in frontend and backend. This portfolio showcases my journey, learnings, and projects in the development field.

projects.title: IFM Diagram Building Tools
projects.description: Project under development for the company I work at. It allows creating intuitive diagrams in IO-Link, Mobile, and ASi-Interface interfaces. The system also offers generating an Excel sheet for item quotation in the company's e-shop, as well as electrical connection diagrams.

projects.title: Londres Barber
projects.description: Landing page developed for a barbershop located in Perus.

projects.title: SalãoCondo
projects.description: System for booking and managing party halls in condominiums. It has three roles (resident, administrator, and doorman). Users can schedule, approve, or cancel bookings, register guest lists, and perform check-in on the event day.

projects.title: NewTechTVS
projects.description: Landing page created for a company selling and servicing TVs located in Santa Ifigênia.

certificates.title: IT Management
certificates.description: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology Management from FATEC

certificates.title: From Zero to API: JavaScript and TypeScript Course - JS/TS
certificates.description: Complete Node.js course covering the creation of secure and scalable RESTful APIs, including authentication with JWT and Bcrypt, best development practices, and performance optimization. Includes Docker, Dockerfile, and TypeScript concepts.

certificates.title: Complete Project NodeJS, React, React Native, TypeScript
certificates.description: Full Stack course teaching complete project development with Node.js, React.js, and React Native, covering backend, frontend, and mobile. Includes database, APIs, best practices, and deployment of production-ready systems.

certificates.title: Tailwind CSS from zero to advanced + Projects
certificates.description: Tailwind CSS course focused on creating professional and responsive layouts using Grid, Flexbox, animations, typography, and pseudo-classes. Includes practical projects and advanced frontend design techniques.

certificates.title: MongoDB: From Basic to Advanced
certificates.description: Course covering MongoDB from installation to advanced queries, CRUD operations, and integration with Node.js. Teaches data manipulation in non-relational databases.

certificates.title: Web Frontend Fundamentals HTML CSS JS + 10+ Projects
certificates.description: Frontend course covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, focused on creating modern, responsive, and interactive websites. Includes Flexbox and Grid layouts, CSS3 effects, SEO, accessibility, and over 10 practical projects.

certificates.title: PRO FIGMA | UI DESIGN with Figma from Beginner to Expert
certificates.description: Complete Figma course covering basic tools to advanced prototyping of apps and websites. Includes UI/UX, componentization, auto layout, animations, user flows, and creating design systems.

certificates.title: English Extreme - Complete Course from Zero to Fluency
certificates.description: Complete English course with practical and progressive methodology focused on listening comprehension, vocabulary, and daily communication. Includes memorization tools, flashcards, and a natural learning approach.

email.title: Send me a message!
email.description: Do you have any questions, proposals, or just want to say hi? Feel free to write me.
